nodes.text: Zebulon Dak Speeder Corporation was a company founded by Zebulon Dak which operated in the early days of the Galactic Empire.

The corporation was the producer of some of the galaxy's fastest landspeeders.
It had a policy dictating that any droid used by an employee must have its memory erased upon induction. When the droids C-3PO and R2-D2 learned that their masters, Thall Joben and his friends, intended to decline an employment offer from the company rather than inflict that, the droids secret stole away to prevent that sacrifice.
